version_description:
It’s now even easier to create a Yoti account with our improved registration process.
We’ve released a new ‘quick scan’ function that lets you scan Yoti codes faster.
We’ve also squashed a few more little bugs to give you an even better experience.

We’ve also squashed a few more little bugs to give you an even better experience.

Yoti now supports iOS 11 for all you early adopters out there.
Yoti now supports iOS 11 for all you early adopters out there.

You can now change your profile photo in Yoti and we’ve made it even easier for you to add your photo ID.
We’ve also squashed a few more bugs to give you an even better experience.

You can now change your profile photo in Yoti and we’ve made it even easier for you to add your photo ID.
We’ve also squashed a few more bugs to give you an even better experience.

We have released Yoti Password Manager for Google Chrome. Download it for free from yoti.com/passwords.
We’ve added an ID card to the homepage to make it even easier to create your ID.

Fingerprint login is here — you can now choose to log in to Yoti with your fingerprint or a PIN.
Uploading documents is easier too and we've squashed some more bugs for a better Yoti experience.

Fingerprint login is here — you can now choose to log in to Yoti with your fingerprint or a PIN.
Uploading documents is easier too and we've squashed some more bugs for a better Yoti experience.

• Uploading a document is now slicker than ever
• You can now prove your age by sharing nothing but your date of birth
• Lots of other little improvements for a better Yoti experience

• Uploading a document is now slicker than ever
• You can now prove your age by sharing nothing but your date of birth
• Lots of other little improvements for a better Yoti experience

• Use the Yoti app to anonymously prove you are under or over 18.
• You can now add a UK CitizenCard to your Yoti account.
• We’ve made adding passports and UK driving licences even easier.
• The app now looks even better for iPhone X users.
•

• Use the Yoti app to anonymously prove you are under or over 18.
• You can now add a UK CitizenCard to your Yoti account.
• We’ve made adding passports and UK driving licences even easier.
• The app now looks even better for iPhone X users.
•

・We now accept an additional 50 ID documents from around the world, including several national identity cards and driving licences.
・The Government of Jersey has chosen Yoti as the official digital identity solution for its citizens.
・‘Using Yoti’ b

・The Government of Jersey has chosen Yoti as the official digital identity solution for its citizens.
・‘Using Yoti’ b

We've updated our privacy policy ready for the revised EU data protection law (GDPR) coming in on 25 May – see www.yoti.com/privacypolicy
We’ve also updated areas of the app in line with the new law.
And made lots of other little improvements.

We've updated our privacy policy ready for the revised EU data protection law (GDPR) coming in on 25 May – see www.yoti.com/privacypolicy
We’ve also updated areas of the app in line with the new law.
And made lots of other little improvements.

- Our app home screen has had a bit of a makeover and now features Yoti Password Manager, making it quicker and easier to access.
- You’ll find additional guidance for adding your passport when creating your Yoti.

* Sharing your details is simpler with automatic facial recognition.
* Introducing ‘Remember Me ID’ – an attribute you share with businesses so you don’t have to give your personal details every time you access their services.

This month the team have been mostly focusing their energy on improving how you create your Yoti. The journey from downloading the app to being the proud owner of a secure digital identity now not only looks better, but is also quicker and easier to compl

This month the team have been mostly focusing their energy on improving how you create your Yoti. The journey from downloading the app to being the proud owner of a secure digital identity now not only looks better, but is also quicker and easier to compl

Create your Yoti using ID documents from more than 160 countries. We now accept driving licences for New Zealand, national ID cards for Singapore and Hong Kong, driving licences and national ID cards for Nigeria, and driving licences and UMID cards for th

What’s new

We now accept the Aadhaar card as a valid form of identification. This will make it even easier for Indian residents to create a Yoti by scanning the card’s QR code.

We now accept national IDs for South Africa and Panama, and national IDs and driving licences for Mexico.

If you haven’t added an ID document that includes your date of birth, you can use our age estimation technology to estimate your age, then add it to your Yoti.

If you don’t add an ID document with your date of birth, our age estimation technology can estimate your age. If you look old enough, you can share this with businesses in seconds.

We’ve updated the way we prove it’s you when you create your Yoti. Now it’s even easier for everyone to set up a Yoti account.

Good news for Indian citizens – you can now download your Aadhaar file from the UIDAI website, then upload it to your Yot

We’ve updated the way we prove it’s you when you create your Yoti. Now it’s even easier for everyone to set up a Yoti account.

Good news for Indian citizens – you can now download your Aadhaar file from the UIDAI website, then upload it to your Yot

We’ve been busy fixing bugs and making improvements. Our new feature allows you to update your mobile number if it has changed since account creation.

We've also updated our privacy information to reflect new features and changes.

We've also updated our privacy information to reflect new features and changes.

We’ve made it easier for you to prove your identity in person to other Yoti users. The new Yoti ID card features your name, photo and a QR code that can be scanned by another user to prove your identity without revealing everything about yourself.

We’ve made it easier for you to prove your identity in person to other Yoti users. The new Yoti ID card features your name, photo and a QR code that can be scanned by another user to prove your identity without revealing everything about yourself.

For this month’s release, we are happy to announce we now support Spanish (Latin-American) language support. We’ve continued to make improvements and now also support several new national IDs and driving licences.

For this month’s release, we are happy to announce we now support Spanish (Latin-American) language support. We’ve continued to make improvements and now also support several new national IDs and driving licences.

We've been busy making improvements to our system for document registration which will make it more reliable. And for those of you who have been using Yoti for COVID-19 test results, you can now view the full details of your test and test history.

We've made it easier for you to add a photo to your Personal details. We've made enhancements to make this a smoother and faster flow.

It’s now easier to access your Yoti – just open the app and explore! When you want to access your personal details, you’ll still need to verify yourself with your PIN or fingerprint.

We’ve made improvements to our document registration journey.  If you are having trouble scanning your document, we’ll now give you more detailed feedback before you retry.
We’ve made improvements to our document registration journey.  If you are having trouble scanning your document, we’ll now give you more detailed feedback before you retry.

For this month’s release, we’ve improved a couple of flows in Settings to make it easier for you to manage your account. We’ve also fixed bugs to make sure you continue to have a seamless experience when navigating the app.

For this month’s release, we’ve improved a couple of flows in Settings to make it easier for you to manage your account. We’ve also fixed bugs to make sure you continue to have a seamless experience when navigating the app.

We’ve continued to make updates to improve account settings, making it easier for users who have forgotten their PIN or need to recover their account. As always, we’ve fixed bugs to give you a smooth experience navigating the app.

We’ve been busy this month improving functionality throughout the app. This includes upgrading the system to improve document scanning, continuing to improve the Change PIN flow and giving users more feedback when capturing a photo to add to their Yoti.
